_header: Have mind for thee how I was born
Subjects: Christ, appeal of, to man; carols, of Christ’s pleading
_description: James Ryman, Appeal of Christ to Man — four quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Hec sunt verba saluatoris / Nolo mortem peccatoris’

CULEe112.First Lines:
haue myende for the how I was bornehow with scourges my flesshe was
                    torne…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…yf thou be lost blame thou not menolo mortem
                        peccatoris
